title: How virtual reality will train the workers of tomorrow
text:
Barry Thompson's mouth drops open in shock. "How can you...?" he begins, and then closes his eyes, gathering himself. "I have twenty more years of experience than anyone in there," he says, gesturing to the office behind him. "Have you looked at my sales numbers?"

But his sales numbers aren't the problem. Next he tries to bargain; then he is lost for words, stammering as he starts and aborts his sentence five times. Finally, he sighs and cracks a joke. "It was a pleasure working with you," he says, ruefully.

Barry has just been fired, but he is not a real person. He is a "virtual human" created by a company called Talespin, the star of a virtual reality (VR) game designed to train managers in...
